item.title: Setting up a home media server
item.description: NAS server If you have a NAS server, you can install Plex or Emby as your media server. Both Plex and Emby have clients for Apple TV and other devices. Raspberry Pi If you have a Raspberry Pi, its relatively simple to turn it into a media server with OSMC and connect it directly to a TV. The downside is that you’ll need to use a keyboard to navigate around.
